parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2
</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> High Command

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns group icons params used for command bar drawing such as color, text, scale, visibility, waypoint visibility, waypoint color.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''getGroupIconParams''' group

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> group: [[Group]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Array]] in format [color, text, scale, visibility, WPvisibility WPcolor], where:
* color: [[Array]] - icon color in format [r,g,b,a]
* text: [[String]] - icon text
* scale: [[Number]] - icon scale
* visibility: [[Boolean]] - icon visibility
* WPvisibility: [[Boolean]] - waypoint visibility
* WPcolor: [[Array]] - waypoint color in format [r,g,b,a]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>_iconParams = [[getGroupIconParams]] [[group]] [[player]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[addGroupIcon]], [[clearGroupIcons]], [[getGroupIcon]], [[groupIconSelectable]], [[groupIconsVisible]], [[onGroupIconClick]], [[removeGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIcon]], [[setGroupIconParams]], [[setGroupIconsSelectable]], [[setGroupIconsVisible]]
</value></part></template>


<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma2</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>tkoh</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template>
